metadata.title: CVE-2022-32081 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: MariaDB v10.4 to v10.7 was discovered to contain an use-after-poison in prepare_inplace_add_virtual at /storage/innobase/handler/handler0alter.cc.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.5 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
